description: The XY&Z series is the sequel series to http://anidb.net/a9956 [Pocket Monsters XY], taking place after the events of the http://anidb.net/a10563 [Mega Evolution] side story. It follows http://anidb.net/ch6693 [Ash Ketchum] continuing his Kalos journey with his companions from the previous series, http://anidb.net/ch61303 [Serena], http://anidb.net/ch61305 [Clemont], and http://anidb.net/ch61304 [Bonnie], as well as Bonnie`s newfound companion, http://anidb.net/ch61289 [Zygarde], to whom she refers to as Squishy.
